  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class Vision
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
    This subsystem is used to detect power cubes

      • imgRequest

        public boolean imgRequest
        Boolean that represents whether or not contours need to be processed. This boolean is checked in the Thread in Robot.java
